description: Try this honey soy chicken stir-fry recipe for dinner tonight. Itâ€™s quick, easy and packed with colourful veg.
keywords: Chicken stir-fry,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Microwave,High protein,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Honey Soy Chicken Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken breast or thigh fillets, cut into strips

recipeInstructions.text: Place cornflour in a jug. Gradually blend with 1/4 cup water. Add soy sauce, honey and ginger and stir to combine. Set aside.
To cook the rice, simply massage the pouch to separate the grains and place in the microwave for the required time as indicated on the packet. Set aside.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan or wok over a high heat. Add chicken and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Reduce heat slightly. Add carrot, broccoli and capsicum and stir-fry for 3 minutes longer, then add green onions and garlic and stir-fry for another minute.
Stir honey soy mixture, then add to frying pan. Simmer, stirring for 2 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and vegetables are tender-crisp. Serve with rice and garnish with extra green onions.
